Class FactoryIdEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.FactoryIdEncoder

  • @Configurable
public class FactoryIdEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Encodes/decodes a resource Id for PageElementResource.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)
